speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: I'm doing well, thank you. How can I help you?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m calling about your overdue account. First, can you verify your date of birth for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Got it. You have an outstanding balance of $500. How do you plan on handling this?

speaker: Customer
text: I need more time to figure it out. Can we set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Listen, lady, you’ve got to sort your shit out. This isn’t a charity.

speaker: Customer
text: I understand the urgency, but I need to discuss this further.

speaker: Agent
text: I don’t give a damn what you need! You owe money, and you better pay it!

speaker: Customer
text: I will do my best to resolve this, but yelling isn't going to help.

speaker: Agent
text: You’re making this harder than it has to be. Just pay up already!

speaker: Customer
text: I’m trying to be cooperative here. Can we please keep this civil?

speaker: Agent
text: Civil? Ha! You’re the one dodging payments. Get your act together!

speaker: Customer
text: I will ensure it's taken care of. Thank you for your time.

speaker: Agent
text: Yeah, whatever. Just don’t make me call you again about this!
